articles.title: Unemployment rate held steady at 7.1% in September, StatCan says
articles.description: Canada's unemployment rate was unchanged in September, and holding at a four-year high amid the ongoing trade war and as tariff policies continue to weigh on the Canadian economy.

articles.title: ANALYSIS: Will Jets, other Canadian teams make NHL playoffs?
articles.description: If you include the Olympics, what we are witnessing right now just might be the golden era for hockey and for the National Hockey League in Canada.

articles.title: ‘A big mess’: Expert, parents criticize Alberta tool kit for students during strike
articles.description: An education expert is criticizing online lessons the Alberta government has curated for students during a provincewide teachers strike as "incoherent."

articles.title: Ontario declares measles outbreak over after nearly a year of spread
articles.description: Ontario's measles outbreak, which sickened more than 2,300 people over the course of nearly a year has been declared over.

articles.title: Thorold man pleads guilty to neo-Nazi terrorism charges, could face 20 years in prison
articles.description: Matthew Althorpe, 29, pleaded guilty in Toronto to three terrorism charges linked to the neo-Nazi group and admitted to producing violent propaganda promoting mass attacks.

articles.title: Family, advocates condemn assault on Muslim man at Ontario hotel
articles.description: The family of a Muslim hotel worker seriously injured in an alleged hate-motivated assault said the attack in Markham, Ont., has left them fearful.

articles.title: Canada Post union switching from countrywide to rotating strikes starting Saturday
articles.description: The union representing Canada Post employees says it will switch from a countrywide strike to rotating strikes starting Saturday that will get mail and parcels moving again.

articles.title: Samsung AI Research Team Builds A Tiny Model With Big Power
articles.description: Samsung’s AI lab in Montreal new Tiny Recursive Model with only 7M parameters performs as well, if not better in some instances, than systems much larger.

articles.title: With Customers at the Core, VinFast Makes EV First Steps Easier

articles.title: S&Ds urge stronger EU action to protect Europe’s economic security amid China’s rare-earth export controls
articles.description:

articles.title: Netflix Canada Teases Stranger Things Experience is Coming to Toronto
articles.description:
Netflix Canada is teasing a Stranger Things experience is making its way to Toronto ahead of the fifth season.
